title: Executive Order 5918-Examination for Designation for Appointment to United States Military and Naval Academies
content: The United States Civil Service Commission is authorized to test the qualifications of applicants for designation for appointment in the United States Military or Naval Academies on nomination of any Member of Congress.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5918-Examination for Designation for Appointment to United States Military and Naval Academies Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361497
